artist: Manufacturer: Minton, Hollins & Co., Stoke-on-Trent, Staffordshire, England, 1868-1962
description: blue glaze; tondo containing scene of  bearded man wearing a turban and sandals before a fire on a pedestal; urns with ribbons in corners; "HIEMS" at center bottom
markings: on bottom, in relief: [MINTON / HOLLINS / & CO / PATENT / TILE / WORKS / STOKE ON / TRENT] and [145]
title: "Hiems" tile
